decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings and documents: FDB-ML01- A001; FDB-ML01- A100; FDB-ML01- A101; FDB-ML01- A102 Rev. 1; FDB-ML01- A103 Rev. 1; FDB-ML01- A104; FDB-ML01- A106 Rev. 1; FDB-ML01- A107 Rev. 1; FDB-ML01- A108 Rev. 1; FDB-ML01- A109 Rev. 1; FDB-ML01- A110 Rev. 1; FDB-ML01- A111 Rev. 1; FDB-ML01- A112 Rev. 1;  FDB-ML01- A113; FDB-ML01- A114; FDB-ML01- A201; FDB-ML01- A202; FDB-ML01- A204; FDB-ML01- A205 Rev. 1; FDB-ML01- A206 Rev. 1; FDB-ML01- A208 Rev. 1; FDB-ML01- A301; FDB-ML01- A303 Rev. 1; FDB-ML01- A304 Rev. 1; FDB-ML01- A305 Rev. 1; FDB-ML01- A306 Rev. 1; FDB-ML01- A307 Rev. 1; FDB-ML01- A302; FDB-ML01- A501; FDB-ML01- A502.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All materials to be used for the external surfaces of the development shall match those described in the approved drawings and documents listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the special character of the Conservation Area, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) and the Ealing Green Conservation Area Management Plan. | The hereby approved rooflight to the front roof slope of the hereby development shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | No part of the roof shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
description: Change of use of a property into single family dwellinghouse; single storey rear extension involving part excavation to lower ground floor level; installation of rear dormer window and one rooflight to front roofslope; internal and external alterations including alterations to fenestration involving windows replacement; front lightwell and insertion of glazed door; and front boundary alterations
